t: How will I get any brand NOC to sell their products on online platforms like Amazon and Flipkart? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): If you want to sell branded products on any E-commerce companies in India like Amazon, Myntra, Flipkart etc. and you don't own the brand then you need a brand authorisation letter or NOC from the brand owner.
